flashcards.english: Rũgama na mwena (Stand on the side), Gũrĩra mũgate na iria (Buy me bread), Aria na arata aku (Speak to your friends), Hinga mũrango tuthĩĩ (Close the door and let us go), Hingũra ibuku tuthoome (Open the book we read)
flashcards.notes: Complete imperative sentences showing practical commands. Pattern: Imperative + object/location. Tuthĩĩ = let us go (subjunctive), Tuthoome = let us read (subjunctive)

flashcards.english: I am happy with this lesson
flashcards.notes: Expression of satisfaction with learning. Gīthūmū = lesson. Pattern: Nī ndīrakena na... = I am happy with...
